short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that will ask a random question from your chosen topic

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Time for a short break, have a quick quiz from your favorite topic. Using the database that have thousands of questions updated regularly. Designed to give a quick question without calculating the score.
